message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its features and benefits, I'm asking for $13,500 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I appreciate you countering, Bob.  While $11,250 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still looking for a bit more. Would you be willing to do $12,500?
I understand you're looking for a bit more, but I'm still not comfortable with $12,500. I'm willing to meet you at $11,750. Can we do that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $12,125?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $12,125. I'm willing to go up to $11,875. Can we meet there?
